title: Digital Phenotyping based on a Mobile App Identifies Distinct and Overlapping Features in Children Diagnosed with Autism versus ADHD
details: V Aikat, PR Krishnappa Babu, KLH Carpenter… - Adjunct Proceedings of the …, 2024
abstract: The high prevalence of autism calls for accessible and scalable technology-assisted screening tools. This will aid in early detection allowing timely access to services and supports. SenseToKnow, a mobile digital phenotyping app, showed potential in …
